<noinclude>

This is the '''Csp card tabs''' template. It should be called in the following format:

<pre>
{{Csp sidebar tabs
|id= (html id) used for the edit button and toggling edit/view tabs
|canEdit= (any value) if filled, edit button and tab are included
|closeButton= (optional: none) to not get button at the bottom edit tab
|title= (text)
|subTitle= (text)
|view= (wikitext) content for view tab
|edit= (wikitext) content for edit tab (optional)
}}
</pre>

{{Csp sidebar tabs
|id=example-tabs
|canEdit=yes
|title=Example title
|subTitle=Example subtitle
|view=<div class="card-body">Example view tab</div>
|edit=<div class="card-body">Example edit tab</div>
}}


</noinclude><includeonly><!--

--><div class="tab-content"><!-- Show title, edit button and current contents
--><input type="radio" id="sidebar-view-{{{id|}}}" name="toggle-sidebar-{{{id|}}}" checked="checked" class="d-none sidebar-view" /><!--
   --><div class="card sidebar-view-tab"><!-- 
     --><div class="card-header"><!-- 
       -->{{#if:{{{canEdit|}}}|<!-- 
           --><span style="float:right"><!-- 
              --><label for="sidebar-edit-{{{id|}}}" class="btn btn-secondary">{{int:csp-label-edit}}</label><!-- 
           --></span><!-- 
       -->}}<!-- 
       --><b class="d-block">{{{title|}}}</b><!-- 
       -->{{{subTitle|}}}<!--
     --></div>
{{{view|}}}<!-- start on new line in case this is required for wikitext formatting
 --></div><!-- end of .card
 -->{{#if:{{{canEdit|}}}|<!-- Edit form
       --><input type="radio" id="sidebar-edit-{{{id|}}}" name="toggle-sidebar-{{{id|}}}" class="d-none sidebar-edit" /><!--
         --><div class="card sidebar-edit-tab"><!--
           --><div class="card-header"><!-- 
                  --><span style="float:right"><!-- 
                    --><label for="sidebar-view-{{{id|}}}" class="btn btn-secondary">{{int:csp-label-close}}</label><!-- 
                  --></span><!-- 
                  --><b class="d-block">{{{title|}}}</b><!-- 
                  -->{{{subTitle|}}}<!-- 
              --></div>
{{{edit|}}}<!-- start on new line in case this is required for wikitext formatting
// show close button if applicable
-->{{#switch:{{{closeButton|}}} |none=|#default=<!--
      --><div class="card-body"><!-- 
      --><label for="sidebar-view-{{{id|}}}" class="btn btn-secondary" >{{int:csp-label-close}}</label><!--
      --></div><!--
-->}}<!-- end of closeButton switch
--></div><!-- end of .card
-->|}}<!-- 
--></div><!-- end of .tab-content

--></includeonly>
